website_summaries.verdict: This affordable pick produces great results with its variety of attachments.
pros: Features a super ergonomic design with a textured handle
One-click attachments are easy to swap out
Everything is compact and easy to store
Users also love that the blender is lightweight
cons: Some users found the whisk attachment a bit flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Cancer and reproductive harm
customer_reviews.text: When I got the package I saw a message on the box " Cancer and reproductive harm". So I immediately returned it without using. I opened the package and I saw a grease under the blade of small food processor which was a proof for the harmfulness of the product. I cannot say anything about how it works or not because I have never used it.
customer_reviews.author: Iman

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using hand blenders for years. The Braun MQ537 is an improvement over the many models I have owned in the past by a variety of companies. I like making asparagus soup. In the past the hand blenders would not be able to deal with the fibers from the asparagus so instead I would go through the drudgery of blending it in batches in my blender. The Braun effortless grinds the veggies to a smooth cream right in the pot. In addition I really like the chopping attachment, it does a great job with onions, carrots and such and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: The Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: I found the materials to be cheap and the power of the blender mediocre. Had a hard time making mashed cauliflower- mashing steamed cauliflower should be a snap but this blender couldn't handle it. I'll be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Binkynose1

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of the great recommendation from Americas Test Kitchen. Had to return because one of the attachments broke while making mashed potatoes. I will reorder it because everything else was good about it.
customer_reviews.author: April D. Bergstresser

customer_reviews.title: Great immersion blender
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender. It does an extremely good job of blending and is amazingly easy to use and clean. I really appreciate not having to do soup blending in batches any longer! It came with a bunch of nice attachments, but I must admit I've yet to use them. All of them appear to be good quality and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: nb

customer_reviews.title: Braun MQ537 Multiquick Hand Blender
customer_reviews.text: I guess we could always use more power but I use this thing everyday on my hemp protein fruit smoothie. It's become a very personal relationship, like a motorcycle. I would feel bad if it died, until a new one came. Anyway I like it I use it every day, I took on vacation and I would buy another. Nice little machine.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Smart combo
customer_reviews.text: I cook from scratch so I use it a lot: it functions very well and has never failed me in a whole year! I wish I had it before instead of several appliances. I think it is also a great gift for unequipped young adults or housewarming.
customer_reviews.author: Lise Krr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered from Hawaii and received it in 4 days - happy it was delivered quickly. I had an older model for almost 20 years and it was dropped and broke. Purchased this expecting the same kind of performance. I love the updated look. Attachments are easier to clean. Need the instruction manual to understand what the two buttons on the hand wand are for and better effectiveness. I haven't used the potato masher attachment yet. Overall I love this product and I use it all the time. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Suzuki

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: I had an older model and the chopper bowl was bad so I decided to upgrade. This unit is more powerful and has more attachments. It’s very easy to use and clean, better yet the food chopper is a much better design. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fullmer

customer_reviews.title: It worked wonderfully and the ravioli was enjoyed by all
customer_reviews.text: I used it to chop cooked chicken, veggies, cheese and herbs for homemade ravioli. It worked wonderfully and the ravioli was enjoyed by all. Quite a handy little time saver for me. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: patann

customer_reviews.title: It Pulverize very well
customer_reviews.text: Yes I use is probably not too much then I can tell that I dislike about this product it could be a little bit more powerful Les splatter Around the edges then my previous Landia
customer_reviews.author: Simon.P Brouton

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new stick blender with a small chopper attachment for making cauliflower rice. My old one worked great but fell apart after almost 10 years of use. After a few failed attempts to just get a small chopper to do that, I ordered exactly what I had before. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Leela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! We saw great reviews on a cooking show and was glad to find it with many of the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie T

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: Have had it about a month now and really like the power in blending my protein drinks as well as the attachments that make chopping my salad ingredients very easy. Strongly recommend the Braun. Well made and cleans easy. I prefer to hand wash but some of the attachments can be put in the dishwasher. Updates to follow as I use the product over time.
customer_reviews.author: H Gerald Prokupek

customer_reviews.title: For the gadget loving foodie
customer_reviews.text: You can get by without this, but it’s convenient and fun to use. Great for purring soups and sauces.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie G.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so far...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product so far. I have not yet used it on heavy jobs like crushing ice, but every other usage has proven this to be a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D.McB

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few times
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for about a few times. Then stopped working. Blending power is not that great
customer_reviews.author: Tristar

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Use for blending, chopping, masher works so-so. Blender attachment works well in limited situations
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Dubrule

customer_reviews.title: Not what it looks like
customer_reviews.text: It’s not easy to use at all I’m still trying to get ahold not to make a mess doing the brownie mix
customer_reviews.author: Evee

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my kitchen needed. Using the hand blender to make baby food daily and also a variety of other meals. I like the food processor as well as I wanted a smaller one for daily cooking needs that wasn’t too hard to clean. Seems powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Elrashidy

customer_reviews.title: Now I’m happy my Bamix died!
customer_reviews.text: I make protein shake smoothies at least once a day and the MQ537 does a great job with the ice cubes, is super easy to handle, and super easy to clean up. I like how I can detach the motor while leaving the business end in the container to remove over the sink. It’s lightweight and powerful. I’m much happier with this machine than the Bamix it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: KCK

customer_reviews.title: Great hand blender
customer_reviews.text: This black hand blender replaced the old one that was beginning to see the end of it's usefulness. This hand blender has a good strong motor. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Travelgator

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my 20-year-old Braun handheld. Nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This is very versatile, seems just as sturdy as the old one (which died because I attempted to blend something that was too thick and burnt out the motor, so my fault entirely). I liked it so much I bought a second one for our vacation home.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry A. Marts

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, powerful, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great mixer that gets a lot of use and powers through everything. Easy to use, easy to clean, doesn’t take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Y Whang

customer_reviews.title: So. So  need the beaker
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t receive the 600 ml Beaker. Other than that it’s okay. I would like to get that cup. I like to make smoothies
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Just I wish the bowl made of glass instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Ayfer

customer_reviews.title: Lost my previous Braun Hand Blender in a fire and was worried how the new model would compare.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it. Obviously it has improved from the previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Hannelore Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love all of these! I use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Araújo

customer_reviews.title: It broke in the second mouth...
customer_reviews.text: I buy them for my little baby. BUT It broke in the second mouth.MY baby hasn't been born yet.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: This gets zero stars. I ordered a 6 piece ...
customer_reviews.text: This gets zero stars. I ordered a 6 piece Braun multi mixer and got a cuisinart chopper in the Braun box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Setting Auto-Switches from Low to High! INJURY DANGER !!!
customer_reviews.text: The "Braun MQ537 Multiquick Hand Blender" I received had two defects. The first one is that the spindle is not properly centered, so the whole unit oscillates and shakes about badly. The second issue is more serious. While using the blender on thinner liquids, it needs to remain in the "low" position to prevent the liquid from being flung all over the place, including you. Unfortunately this blender is automatically switching itself from the low setting I have it on to the high setting all on its own. This has caused the hot liquid I'm blending to splash out all over the place, and has burned me. This is very dangerous and has caused me injury from burns.
customer_reviews.author: Tellin' it like it is!

customer_reviews.title: Deceitful product information
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as having a stainless steel shaft and bell and blades -- but they don't tell you that the inside of the bell has a non-stick coating. I already discarded the box and packaging, so I cannot return the blender, but I CAN toss it into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Freitag

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this stick blender! Great power, great accessories and a breeze to clean. The little food processor attachment seems dinky, but it Blends up some hummus or some ice in seconds. I've been using it regularly for about six months, and I've had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: J.B

customer_reviews.title: ON/OFF BUTTONS HARD TO USE
customer_reviews.text: out of the box review. right away i noticed that the on/off buttons were hard to push and uncomfortable/painful on the finger tips to use. no mention of that on the "cooks country" review. called customer service to complain and received a call back from a supervisor who assured me my complaint would be heard. would also be nice if the mixing canister came with a storage lid.
customer_reviews.author: rustyboy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible chopper
customer_reviews.text: I use a chopper daily and my old one gave up. I am so disappointed in this one. It doesn't chop anything properly. Not sure if it is because it is oversized or if the blender doesn't have enough power. I'm extremely disappointed and so upset I didn't keep the box to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Morgane

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to replace my previous Braun MultiQuick which lasted 15 years. So far, I am underwhelmed by its performance as an immersion blender and mixer compared to my old one. It isn’t nearly as powerful. It also seems less durable than my previous model; I will be shocked if I get 5 years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine4173

customer_reviews.title: After using it maybe once per week the motor just ...
customer_reviews.text: After using it maybe once per week the motor just stopped working. Will be calling the manufacturer as Amazon is suggesting... Well, I just called the number and it was a customer care of Delonghi and Kenwood brands - it has nothing to do with Braun.
customer_reviews.author: Vika

customer_reviews.title: Love the Braun Hand Blender!
customer_reviews.text: I had an earlier version of the Braun Hand Blender. Used it every day but it never wore out. I donated the old one and got a new one - and I love the new one too. I use it to blend protein shakes, collagen powder into coconut milk or almond milk, etc.; and to quickly mix Vitamin C packets into water. It has 2 speeds, perfect! And the uses are limitless. The chopper is amazing too. Chop anything for a salad or veggies in seconds.. Worth the price. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Thankful

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for every job.
customer_reviews.text: Love this - it stays in place on the counter and the attach,ends are everything you could want. Thought I would use it as a backup to another similar item I already had. This one quickly became my go-to and the other is now the backup. This one has great power, sturdy attachments and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Baker Lady

customer_reviews.title: love it, use it almost daily
customer_reviews.text: great little machine. Handy for small jobs. Very versatile. If you out eggshells in the little chopper container, the container will get scratched but it beats doing it by hand. cheese chops wonderful, eggs get beaten in a jiffy and mayo is great. I haven't mashed potatoes yet but my smoothies turn out smooth
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good as a beater
customer_reviews.text: So much more flimsy than the old multi mix that dies in me after many years. The single beater attachment won’t mix cookie dough, it feels like it will break off. Chopper and hand blender are fine, but the whole thing feels very junky. Disappointing,
customer_reviews.author: actorgirl

customer_reviews.title: Hard working, and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for my 30 year old Braun hand blender. Solid construction, and with useful attachments. I didn't think my older blender could be improved, but this set is definitely an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Tertius

customer_reviews.title: Better Than the Others
customer_reviews.text: I've owned three hand-held mixers. Two have broken after only a couple years of use. So far, this one is holding up fine. The small bowl attachment is super useful.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis LaPierre

customer_reviews.title: Great for mashed potatoes
customer_reviews.text: Wife used to mash potatoes in a blender. The process took hours. This cuts the time down to minutes and provides a much more consistent result. She loves it. Very high quality and good value. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jake W.

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to our Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We have downsized and this is perfect for just the two of us. Do not have to get out heavier machines for chopping and mixing. We just received and are very happy, I think it is too early to give a durability assement, but seems very well bilt.
customer_reviews.author: T. R. L.

customer_reviews.title: The attachments
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift from my husband. I love all the different attachment. Easy to use and clean the attachment.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The potato masher does not work , the hand blender does a bad job it did not blend. I wish I would of tried it before the return date was up. A lot of money for this product that does not work well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Taffy

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My only regret is that I did not see the newer more powerful model for $20 more until after I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Copper

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing missing is a caddy to hold all of the pieces together. I’m thinking about giving my Ninja away... just saying
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good price for this set, and it works well for pureeing beans.
customer_reviews.author: Whistler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I'm a brand-loyal person. Braun is hands down top quality brand. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It worked great. It was just what I wanted to mix ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked great. It was just what I wanted to mix small amounts of things that you don`t need a large mixer for.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

product_meta.title: Braun 4-in-1 Immersion Hand Blender, Powerful 350W Stainless Steel Stick Blender, Multi-Speed + 2-Cup Food Processor, Whisk, Beaker, Masher, Easy to Clean, Black, MultiQuick MQ537BK
product_meta.description: The global leader in hand blenders has done it again with the Braun Multi Quick 5 hand blender, Modelmq537. Fitting neatly and comfortably in your hand, you're to use this cooking tool daily for all of your culinary tasks. A beaker, whisk, 2-cup chopper and masher let you master everything from sauces to smoothies and soups. The unique Power Bell system takes flavor profiles to new levels with finer and faster blending capabilities. The slip-proof ergonomic grip of the Braun 5 hand blender gives 'Comfort food' a whole new meaning. And when it comes to technology, the German-engineered motor is driven by power and durability with multiple attachments that open up a world of new possibilities for creative cooking. The 5 hand blender, MQ537 , includes a beaker, whisk, 2-cup chopper and masher that let you master everything from sauces to whipped cream and soups.
feature_bullets: Extra light and ergonomic design for maximum flexibility; powerful 350W
Power Bell technology; durable stainless steel blades and unique bell-shaped blending shaft for fast and finer results. Technology exclusive to Braun
Easy Click ensures that all attachments can be removed in one simple click
Turbo boost for added power and soft grip for comfortable use

Includes stainless steel blending shaft, 20 fluid ounce beaker, whisk, masher accessory and 2-cup chopper and Note: The unit is designed for the turbo button to be activate with a little more force than the other button

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars294 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
